title: PAN - Heftig Deftig
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Organic, Western, Fast food, Take-out, Catering, European, German, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Opened early Feb 2016. Uses fresh, organic and regional produce. Serves a variety of hot dogs, including a made-in-house vegan sausage. Three out of four menus are available as vegan menus. Fresh chips/crisps are made-in-house. The sauces are all created by the owner, and most of them are vegan. A small and cozy place, with a few places to sit and eat outside.
